channel.title: general on Newsround
channel.description: Recent content in general on Newsround

item.title: Trump admin sues woman who failed to self deport for nearly $1 million - Politico
item.description: The new lawsuit is part of a wave of litigation seeking fines for undocumented immigrants for failing to depart the country.

item.title: Klobuchar will run for Minnesota governor after Walz ends bid. Democratic senator is a Trump critic - AP News
item.description: Amy Klobuchar says she’s running for governor of Minnesota. The Democratic senator is promising to take on President Donald Trump’s administration and unify the state. She announced her candidacy in a video Thursday. Klobuchar’s decision gives Democrats a hig…

item.title: Handling of Pretti investigation has some prosecutors on verge of quitting - The Washington Post
item.description: Federal prosecutors in Minneapolis, deeply frustrated by the response to the shootings of Renée Good and Alex Pretti, have suggested they could resign en masse.

item.title: Japan’s Sanae Takaichi is proving a surprisingly popular prime minister - The Washington Post
item.description: The unconventional leader — for starters, she’s a woman — has called an early election for Feb. 8 in an effort to win a broad public mandate for change.

item.description: Russia received 38 soldiers' bodies in exchange as part of an agreement between the warring countries.

item.description: The European Union has announced sanctions on 15 Iranian officials, including top commanders and officials of the paramilitary Revolutionary Guard, over Tehran’s deadly crackdown on nationwide protests. The sanctions announced Thursday also included measures …
